Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2010 11:44AM ankan wrote: I'm scheduled for the mammosite balloon 1/27 (surgery was 1/15 - lumpectomy).  Did it hurt when they put the balloon in?  Was the tiredness just during the week of radiation?  Were you able to work during that time?  Hope I'm able to sleep again one of these days!
